person.persName: Col. John Hopkins Grider (Col. of 52nd KY Infantry (Union))

body.p: Born and resided in Bowling Green, Warren County, Kentucky. Served as Warren County constable. Held five enslaved African Americans, according to 1860 slave census schedule. Enlisted in the Union army as Major of the 9th Kentucky Infantry. Later promoted to Colonel of the 52nd Kentucky Infantry.
